blocks.name: nexple
blocks.content: A lower bound for an exponentiation. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 19-Aug-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm nexple(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(c1, cr), wbr(nat2, cle, c1)), wbr(c0, cle, co(c1, cexp, c0)))
} = {
  mpjaodan(w3a(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(c1, cr), wbr(nat2, cle, c1)), wbr(c0, cle, co(c1, cexp, c0)), wcel(c0, cn), wceq(c0, nat0))
  syl3anc(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(c1, cr), wbr(nat2, cle, c1)), wcel(c0, cn)), wbr(c0, cle, co(c1, cexp, c0)), wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cr), wbr(nat2, cle, c1))
  simpr(w3a(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(c1, cr), wbr(nat2, cle, c1)), wcel(c0, cn))
  simpl2(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(c1, cr), wbr(nat2, cle, c1), wcel(c0, cn))
  simpl3(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(c1, cr), wbr(nat2, cle, c1), wcel(c0, cn))
  3impib(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cr), wbr(nat2, cle, c1), wbr(c0, cle, co(c1, cexp, c0)))
  nnind(hs0, hs1, c0, wi(wa(wcel(c1, cr), wbr(nat2, cle, c1)), wbr(c0, cle, co(c1, cexp, c0))), wi(wa(wcel(c1, cr), wbr(nat2, cle, c1)), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, co(c1, cexp, cv(hs0)))), wi(wa(wcel(c1, cr), wbr(nat2, cle, c1)), wbr(nat1, cle, co(c1, cexp, nat1))), wi(wa(wcel(c1, cr), wbr(nat2, cle, c1)), wbr(cv(hs1), cle, co(c1, cexp, cv(hs1)))), wi(wa(wcel(c1, cr), wbr(nat2, cle, c1)), wbr(co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1), cle, co(c1, cexp, co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1)))))
  imbi2d(wceq(cv(hs0), nat1), wa(wcel(c1, cr), wbr(nat2, cle, c1)), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, co(c1, cexp, cv(hs0))), wbr(nat1, cle, co(c1, cexp, nat1)))
  breq12d(cv(hs0), cle, co(c1, cexp, cv(hs0)), nat1, co(c1, cexp, nat1), wceq(cv(hs0), nat1))
  id(wceq(cv(hs0), nat1))
  oveq2(cv(hs0), nat1, c1, cexp)
  imbi2d(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wa(wcel(c1, cr), wbr(nat2, cle, c1)), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, co(c1, cexp, cv(hs0))), wbr(cv(hs1), cle, co(c1, cexp, cv(hs1))))
  breq12d(cv(hs0), cle, co(c1, cexp, cv(hs0)), cv(hs1), co(c1, cexp, cv(hs1)), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))
  id(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))
  oveq2(cv(hs0), cv(hs1), c1, cexp)
  imbi2d(wceq(cv(hs0), co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1)), wa(wcel(c1, cr), wbr(nat2, cle, c1)), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, co(c1, cexp, cv(hs0))), wbr(co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1), cle, co(c1, cexp, co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1))))
  breq12d(cv(hs0), cle, co(c1, cexp, cv(hs0)), co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1), co(c1, cexp, co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1)), wceq(cv(hs0), co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1)))
  id(wceq(cv(hs0), co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1)))
  oveq2(cv(hs0), co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1), c1, cexp)
  imbi2d(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wa(wcel(c1, cr), wbr(nat2, cle, c1)), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, co(c1, cexp, cv(hs0))), wbr(c0, cle, co(c1, cexp, c0)))
  breq12d(cv(hs0), cle, co(c1, cexp, cv(hs0)), c0, co(c1, cexp, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  id(wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  oveq2(cv(hs0), c0, c1, cexp)
  expge1d(c1, nat1, wa(wcel(c1, cr), wbr(nat2, cle, c1)))
  a1i(wa(wcel(c1, cr), wbr(nat2, cle, c1)), wcel(nat1, cn0))
  1nn0()
  letrd(nat1, c1, nat2, wa(wcel(c1, cr), wbr(nat2, cle, c1)))
  1red(wa(wcel(c1, cr), wbr(nat2, cle, c1)))
  a1i(wa(wcel(c1, cr), wbr(nat2, cle, c1)), wbr(nat1, cle, nat2))
  1le2()
  a2d(wcel(cv(hs1), cn), wa(wcel(c1, cr), wbr(nat2, cle, c1)), wbr(cv(hs1), cle, co(c1, cexp, cv(hs1))), wbr(co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1), cle, co(c1, cexp, co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1))))
  3exp(wcel(cv(hs1), cn), wa(wcel(c1, cr), wbr(nat2, cle, c1)), wbr(cv(hs1), cle, co(c1, cexp, cv(hs1))), wbr(co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1), cle, co(c1, cexp, co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1))))
  breqtrrd(co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1), cle, co(c1, cexp, co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1)), co(co(c1, cexp, cv(hs1)), cmul, c1), w3a(wcel(cv(hs1), cn), wa(wcel(c1, cr), wbr(nat2, cle, c1)), wbr(cv(hs1), cle, co(c1, cexp, cv(hs1)))))
  letrd(co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1), co(co(c1, cexp, cv(hs1)), cmul, c1), co(cv(hs1), cmul, c1), w3a(wcel(cv(hs1), cn), wa(wcel(c1, cr), wbr(nat2, cle, c1)), wbr(cv(hs1), cle, co(c1, cexp, cv(hs1)))))
  remulcld(co(c1, cexp, cv(hs1)), c1, w3a(wcel(cv(hs1), cn), wa(wcel(c1, cr), wbr(nat2, cle, c1)), wbr(cv(hs1), cle, co(c1, cexp, cv(hs1)))))
  letrd(co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1), co(cv(hs1), cmul, c1), co(cv(hs1), cmul, nat2), w3a(wcel(cv(hs1), cn), wa(wcel(c1, cr), wbr(nat2, cle, c1)), wbr(cv(hs1), cle, co(c1, cexp, cv(hs1)))))
  readdcld(cv(hs1), nat1, w3a(wcel(cv(hs1), cn), wa(wcel(c1, cr), wbr(nat2, cle, c1)), wbr(cv(hs1), cle, co(c1, cexp, cv(hs1)))))
  remulcld(cv(hs1), nat2, w3a(wcel(cv(hs1), cn), wa(wcel(c1, cr), wbr(nat2, cle, c1)), wbr(cv(hs1), cle, co(c1, cexp, cv(hs1)))))
  remulcld(cv(hs1), c1, w3a(wcel(cv(hs1), cn), wa(wcel(c1, cr), wbr(nat2, cle, c1)), wbr(cv(hs1), cle, co(c1, cexp, cv(hs1)))))
  breqtrrd(co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1), cle, co(cv(hs1), cmul, nat2), co(cv(hs1), caddc, cv(hs1)), w3a(wcel(cv(hs1), cn), wa(wcel(c1, cr), wbr(nat2, cle, c1)), wbr(cv(hs1), cle, co(c1, cexp, cv(hs1)))))
  leadd2dd(cv(hs1), nat1, cv(hs1), w3a(wcel(cv(hs1), cn), wa(wcel(c1, cr), wbr(nat2, cle, c1)), wbr(cv(hs1), cle, co(c1, cexp, cv(hs1)))))
  1red(w3a(wcel(cv(hs1), cn), wa(wcel(c1, cr), wbr(nat2, cle, c1)), wbr(cv(hs1), cle, co(c1, cexp, cv(hs1)))))
  nnge1d(cv(hs1), w3a(wcel(cv(hs1), cn), wa(wcel(c1, cr), wbr(nat2, cle, c1)), wbr(cv(hs1), cle, co(c1, cexp, cv(hs1)))))
  times2d(cv(hs1), w3a(wcel(cv(hs1), cn), wa(wcel(c1, cr), wbr(nat2, cle, c1)), wbr(cv(hs1), cle, co(c1, cexp, cv(hs1)))))
  recnd(cv(hs1), w3a(wcel(cv(hs1), cn), wa(wcel(c1, cr), wbr(nat2, cle, c1)), wbr(cv(hs1), cle, co(c1, cexp, cv(hs1)))))
  lemul2ad(cv(hs1), nat2, c1, w3a(wcel(cv(hs1), cn), wa(wcel(c1, cr), wbr(nat2, cle, c1)), wbr(cv(hs1), cle, co(c1, cexp, cv(hs1)))))
  a1i(w3a(wcel(cv(hs1), cn), wa(wcel(c1, cr), wbr(nat2, cle, c1)), wbr(cv(hs1), cle, co(c1, cexp, cv(hs1)))), wcel(nat2, cr))
  nn0ge0d(cv(hs1), w3a(wcel(cv(hs1), cn), wa(wcel(c1, cr), wbr(nat2, cle, c1)), wbr(cv(hs1), cle, co(c1, cexp, cv(hs1)))))
  simp2r(wcel(cv(hs1), cn), wcel(c1, cr), wbr(nat2, cle, c1), wbr(cv(hs1), cle, co(c1, cexp, cv(hs1))))
  lemul1ad(cv(hs1), c1, co(c1, cexp, cv(hs1)), w3a(wcel(cv(hs1), cn), wa(wcel(c1, cr), wbr(nat2, cle, c1)), wbr(cv(hs1), cle, co(c1, cexp, cv(hs1)))))
  nn0red(cv(hs1), w3a(wcel(cv(hs1), cn), wa(wcel(c1, cr), wbr(nat2, cle, c1)), wbr(cv(hs1), cle, co(c1, cexp, cv(hs1)))))
  reexpcld(c1, cv(hs1), w3a(wcel(cv(hs1), cn), wa(wcel(c1, cr), wbr(nat2, cle, c1)), wbr(cv(hs1), cle, co(c1, cexp, cv(hs1)))))
  3ad2ant2(wcel(cv(hs1), cn), wa(wcel(c1, cr), wbr(nat2, cle, c1)), wbr(cv(hs1), cle, co(c1, cexp, cv(hs1))), wbr(nat0, cle, c1))
  letrd(nat0, c1, nat2, wa(wcel(c1, cr), wbr(nat2, cle, c1)))
  0red(wa(wcel(c1, cr), wbr(nat2, cle, c1)))
  a1i(wa(wcel(c1, cr), wbr(nat2, cle, c1)), wcel(nat2, cr))
  2re()
  a1i(wa(wcel(c1, cr), wbr(nat2, cle, c1)), wbr(nat0, cle, nat2))
  0le2()
  simpr(wcel(c1, cr), wbr(nat2, cle, c1))
  simp3(wcel(cv(hs1), cn), wa(wcel(c1, cr), wbr(nat2, cle, c1)), wbr(cv(hs1), cle, co(c1, cexp, cv(hs1))))
  expp1d(c1, cv(hs1), w3a(wcel(cv(hs1), cn), wa(wcel(c1, cr), wbr(nat2, cle, c1)), wbr(cv(hs1), cle, co(c1, cexp, cv(hs1)))))
  recnd(c1, w3a(wcel(cv(hs1), cn), wa(wcel(c1, cr), wbr(nat2, cle, c1)), wbr(cv(hs1), cle, co(c1, cexp, cv(hs1)))))
  3ad2ant2(wcel(cv(hs1), cn), wa(wcel(c1, cr), wbr(nat2, cle, c1)), wbr(cv(hs1), cle, co(c1, cexp, cv(hs1))), wcel(c1, cr))
  simpl(wcel(c1, cr), wbr(nat2, cle, c1))
  nnnn0d(cv(hs1), w3a(wcel(cv(hs1), cn), wa(wcel(c1, cr), wbr(nat2, cle, c1)), wbr(cv(hs1), cle, co(c1, cexp, cv(hs1)))))
  simp1(wcel(cv(hs1), cn), wa(wcel(c1, cr), wbr(nat2, cle, c1)), wbr(cv(hs1), cle, co(c1, cexp, cv(hs1))))
  3brtr4d(c0, cle, co(c1, cexp, c0), nat0, nat1, wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(c1, cr), wbr(nat2, cle, c1)), wceq(c0, nat0)))
  a1i(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(c1, cr), wbr(nat2, cle, c1)), wceq(c0, nat0)), wbr(nat0, cle, nat1))
  0le1()
  eqtrd(co(c1, cexp, c0), nat1, co(c1, cexp, nat0), wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(c1, cr), wbr(nat2, cle, c1)), wceq(c0, nat0)))
  oveq2d(c1, cexp, c0, nat0, wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(c1, cr), wbr(nat2, cle, c1)), wceq(c0, nat0)))
  simpr(w3a(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(c1, cr), wbr(nat2, cle, c1)), wceq(c0, nat0))
  exp0d(c1, wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(c1, cr), wbr(nat2, cle, c1)), wceq(c0, nat0)))
  recnd(c1, wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(c1, cr), wbr(nat2, cle, c1)), wceq(c0, nat0)))
  simpl2(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(c1, cr), wbr(nat2, cle, c1), wceq(c0, nat0))
  3ad2ant1(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(c1, cr), wbr(nat2, cle, c1), wo(wcel(c0, cn), wceq(c0, nat0)))
  biimpi(wcel(c0, cn0), wo(wcel(c0, cn), wceq(c0, nat0)))
  elnn0(c0)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(wi(wa(wcel(c1, cr), wbr(nat2, cle, c1)), wbr(c0, cle, co(c1, cexp, c0))))
  diff.hs0.w(wi(wa(wcel(c1, cr), wbr(nat2, cle, c1)), wbr(nat1, cle, co(c1, cexp, nat1))))
  diff.hs0.w(wi(wa(wcel(c1, cr), wbr(nat2, cle, c1)), wbr(cv(hs1), cle, co(c1, cexp, cv(hs1)))))
  diff.hs0.w(wi(wa(wcel(c1, cr), wbr(nat2, cle, c1)), wbr(co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1), cle, co(c1, cexp, co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1)))))
  diff.hs1.w(wi(wa(wcel(c1, cr), wbr(nat2, cle, c1)), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, co(c1, cexp, cv(hs0)))))
}
